name: BEATS TO KILL TO
description:
Controls

Move - WASD

Dash - Right Click

Attack 1 - Left Click

Attack 2 - Shift

Switch Weapons - Q

How To Start
  1. Have Steam open when launching the game
  2. Optional - Launch the game through steam to get the steam overlay
  3. Invite your friends through steam or have them find your server in the join tab
  4. Have everyone in the lobby ready up
How To Play
  1. Attack and dash to the beat of the music
  2. Defeat all opponents to win a round
  3. First player to win 3 rounds wins
Social Media
